location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Major Charles Grant, 1 Assistant Resident to Lieutenant-Colonel Edward Charles Ross, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Political Resident that at a meeting held by the Assistant Resident, it was determined that the claims of the creditors of the firm Been Rejub [Bin Rajab] should be investigated by the law courts of Bahrain. It notes that at the end of three months, a 'final adjustment' will be made.
